sentences.english: It works on my 9-month old baby who suffers from eczema.
sentences.chinese: 我9个月年夜的宝宝得了湿疹，它对他有用果的。

sentences.english: The past few days because he ate some dried small shrimps, his face a lot of eczema.
sentences.chinese: 因为他这几天吃了些虾皮，脸上起了许多湿疹。

sentences.english: Wheatgrass helps with skin problems such as eczema or psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 麦草有助于改善皮肤问题，例如湿疹或牛皮癣。

sentences.english: Objective T0 study the efficacy and safety of erfukang liniment topical application in the treatment of infantile eczema.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察儿肤康搽剂治疗婴儿湿疹的疗效与安全性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of patch test in eyelid eczematous dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨斑贴试验在眼睑皮炎湿疹中的作用。

sentences.english: Suffer from a skin condition like eczema or psoriasis?
sentences.chinese: 患有类似湿疹或牛皮癣吗？

sentences.english: This natural remedy also helps in reducing various rashes and eczema.
sentences.chinese: 这个自然方法对减少各种皮疹和湿疹也很有效。

sentences.english: Anti-worms, eliminate pains, cure cold and eczema.
sentences.chinese: 杀虫驱虫，止痛，治疗风寒感冒及湿疹。

sentences.english: In fact, this is eczema, with erythromycin eye ointment applied twice.
sentences.chinese: 其实这是湿疹，用红霉素眼膏涂抹两次即可。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preparation method of Shizhen ointment, and establish the standard and method of it's quality control.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究湿疹软膏的制备及质量控制标准与方法。

sentences.english: Scratching can actually trigger eczematous rashes.
sentences.chinese: 抓挠事实上可以引起湿疹性的皮疹。

sentences.english: His eczema’s back on his legs.
sentences.chinese: 他的腿上又长出了湿疹。

sentences.english: MethodApply wet application of Chinses drug and nursing on 56 cases.
sentences.chinese: 采用自制中药湿敷配合护理治疗56例急性湿疹。

sentences.english: Methods To detect the allergens of eczema with Intracutaneous Test.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用变应原皮内试验方法检测湿疹患者过敏原。

sentences.english: Also, I would like to know milk ringworm and eczema What is the relationship.
sentences.chinese: 还有，我想知道奶癣和湿疹是什么关系。

definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
miliaria (type of skin disease)/prickly heat/sweat rash
